name: Doodle-Rama
description:
Doodle-Rama is a student made game where players complete various painting puzzles. The game is split into two phases, the first being a painting phase in which players paint platforms bridges or shields on the map, and the second being the platforming phase where players physically traverse the map they painted on. The player's goal is to reach the green cube at the end of the level.

Player's can paint with three different colors which affect the player when they are touching.

Yellow Paint: Allows the player to jump higher and reduce their gravity

Red Paint: Speeds the player up as long as they are contacting it.

Blue Paint: Used to block hazards and enemies while slowing them down.
